biotools.summary: Software for simple and flexible RNA-Seq read counting. It allows the user to assign priorities to certain feature types (e.g. higher priority for protein-coding genes compared to rRNA- coding genes) or to add flanking regions.

bioschemas.name: Rcount
bioschemas.summary: Software for simple and flexible RNA-Seq read counting. It allows the user to assign priorities to certain feature types (e.g. higher priority for protein-coding genes compared to rRNA- coding genes) or to add flanking regions.
